alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lake County through 445 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, or 11 miles northeast of Ely, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Basswood Lake and Snowbank Lake around 445 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ensign Lake, Disappointment Lake, Greenstone Lake, Ojibway Lake, Fourtown Lake, Lake Two and Farm Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters. If on or near area lakes, get off or out of the water. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter inside a vehicle or sturdy structure now! Do not be caught on or in the water during a thunderstorm.
